entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 30. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
